headline: Allegis Global Solutions to Host Speaker Panel, "Navigating What's Next: From Static Models to Agile, Integrated Ecosystems," at Staffing Industry Analysts' CWS Summit North America
summary: Allegis Global Solutions, the leading provider of global workforce solutions, will host a panel, "Navigating What's Next: From Static Models to Agile, Integrated Ecosystems," at Staffing Industry Analysts' (SIA) CWS Summit North America, on September 8, 2025, at the Omni in Dallas, Texas.

headline: Buy Now Pay Later Market Outlook to 2030, with Detailed Profiles of Afterpay, Klarna, Affirm, PayPal, Sezzle, FlexiPay, PayLater Pro, SplitIt, EasyPay Later, and BuyNow PayLater Solutions
summary: The BNPL Market is expanding due to rising e-commerce adoption, the popularity of digital wallets, and consumer demand for flexible payments. Key regions like the US, UK, and Australia dominate, with supportive regulations aiding growth. Challenges include regulatory scrutiny and consumer debt concerns. headline: Affirm Rival Klarna To Launch IPO Amid Fierce Buy Now, Pay Later Battle
summary: Klarna, a BNPL rival of Affirm, aims to raise up to $1.27 billion in its IPO. Affirm stock has advanced 41% in 2025.

headline: Hyperliquid Smashes Revenue Record with $106M in August, Dominates 70% of DeFi Perps Market
summary: Hyperliquid shattered revenue records in August with $106 million earned from perpetual futures trading, marking a 23% increase from July’s $86.6 million as the decentralized exchange captured 70% market share among DeFi perpetuals platforms. The milestone came alongside $383 billion in monthly trading volume and an annualized revenue reaching $1.25 ...

headline: How PayPal & other fintech firms are taking share from big banks
summary: Banking isn't what it used to be. Big banks are facing competition from the likes of PayPal (PYPL), Robinhood (HOOD), and Rocket (RKT). Great Hill Capital chairman and managing member Thomas Hayes explains why he likes PayPal specifically, while Hennessy Funds portfolio manager David Ellison shares how rising fintech firms have managed to steal the momentum. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
